title: Translation of "toxic effects" in Spanish
description: Translations in context of "toxic effects" in English-Spanish from Reverso Context: No toxic effects have been described in humans regarding to mallow.
cleaned_text: The dose levels should be spaced to produce a gradation of toxic effects. Las dosis han de ser progresivas para obtener una gradación de efectos tóxicos.
